Broadcast.description: Wi-Fi BSS enable broadcast SSID flag.

Id.possible_values: any string with length from 1 up to 64 chars

Name.possible_values: any string with length from 1 up to 64 chars

SSID.possible_values: any string with up to 32 chars

SecurityKey.possible_values: valid password depending on the SecurityMode

application/json.example: {"Id": "Guest", "Name": "Guest", "Enabled": true, "Broadcast": true, "BSSID": "AA:BB:CC:00:11:22", "SSID": "My Guest Network", "SecurityKey": "abc12345678", "SecurityMode": "WPA2", "Encryption": "AES"}

Interfaces.Physical.Network.LAN.Wi-Fi.Ra.summary: Retrieves a list of Wi-Fi BSSs.

application/json.example: {"Header": {"Name": "OK"}, "Body": {"List": [{"Id": "Guest", "Name": "Guest", "Enabled": true, "Status": "Active", "Broadcast": true, "BSSID": "AA:BB:CC:00:11:22", "SSID": "My Guest Network", "SecurityKey": "abc12345678", "SecurityMode": "WPA2", "Encryption": "AES", "Statistics": {"Bytes": {"Transmitted": 0, "Received": 0}, "Packets": {"Transmitted": 0, "Received": 0}, "StationsCount": 0}}], "Limit": 10, "Offset": 0}}

Limit.description: Wi-Fi BSS maximum number of returned entries.
Limit.possible_values: "0" to fetch all entries or positive integer

Offset.possible_values: "0" to fetch all entries or positive integer

Interfaces.Physical.Network.LAN.Wi-Fi.Ra.summary: Retrieves the status and configuration parameters in regards to the (specified) Wi-Fi BSS.

application/json.example: {"Header": {"Name": "OK"}, "Body": {"Id": "Guest", "Name": "Guest", "Enabled": true, "Status": "Active", "Broadcast": true, "BSSID": "AA:BB:CC:00:11:22", "SSID": "My Guest Network", "SecurityKey": "abc12345678", "SecurityMode": "WPA2", "Encryption": "AES", "Statistics": {"Bytes": {"Transmitted": 0, "Received": 0}, "Packets": {"Transmitted": 0, "Received": 0}, "StationsCount": 0}}}

Broadcast.description: Wi-Fi BSS enable broadcast SSID flag.

Id.possible_values: any string with length from 1 up to 64 chars

Name.possible_values: any string with length from 1 up to 64 chars

SSID.possible_values: any string with up to 32 chars

SecurityKey.possible_values: valid password depending on the SecurityMode

Status.possible_values: Connected (the interface is enabled - "Enabled": true - and there is connectivity), "Disconnected", the interface is enabled - "Enabled": true - but there is no connectivity, "Attached" (the interface is connected and disabled - "Enabled": false) or "Detached" (means that the interface is not binded to the CPE - USB Dongle is not plugged - Theorethicaly this mode is only applicable to gateways with external interfaces pluged via USB/SFP).
